0.1.name: wordpress/wp-ktorysk
0.1.description:
ktory.sk is Slovak discussion forum connected to Facebook. You can put there a question started with ktory (means which in Slovak). Whoever can put an answer, and people can vote for that. To every question there is discussion with FB Comment Plugin.

Every question can be shared, and for this you can use this WP-plugin.

After installation the plugin, you can use magic strings [http://ktory.sk/?id=53&width=400&height=400] in your posts, where id is question id from URL, and width, height are optional parameters, default are 300x300

Please visit ktory.sk to see that in action.
